title: Send Notification Tool
description: Send both SMS and email notification in one call

function.name: send_notification
function.description: Send a notification to the same recipient by both SMS and email in one call. Use this when you want guaranteed dual-channel delivery.

message.description: Main message text to send via both SMS and email (required)

email_subject.description: Email subject line (optional, defaults to HVAC-R Finest Notification)
